Scientific writing

I worked as a scientific writer for several years during my PhD and postdoc, writing scientific news articles and wiki-style educational content.

Ossila

Ossila develops and manufactures equipment, materials, and components for advanced scientific research, specialising in organic electronics, photovoltaics, and perovskite solar cells.

I worked for Ossila in the time they were bringing their spectrometer onto the market. I wrote scientific content for the company website, explaining key physical concepts and mechanisms related to the optical properties of spectrometers, organic semiconductors, and molecular spectroscopy. I also created accompanying graphics — including schematics, diagrams, and experimental data — to make the resources as clear and useful to other scientists as possible.
